entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [S.P.CoreLib]System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat._value errors when publish with PublishReadyToRun #79965
  • [API Proposal]: Matrix4x4.CreateViewport #79961
  • [API Proposal]: Adding and subtracting floats with vectors #79960

Closed

  • [LSG] warning CS8785: Generator 'LoggerMessageGenerator' failed to generate source. #77525
    8.0.0
  • Precondition failure: File has not had execution verified #79439

PullRequests

Created

  • Disposed change token registration should not raise consumer #79966
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix type name parsing in NativeAOT #79963
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete token scanning from JIT/EE interface #79964
    area-Interop-coreclr

Updated

  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #79760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix the ARM's `double` register name displayed in JitDisasm/JitDump #79949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix condition in backport.yml to also trigger on schedule #79951
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
